title: Giving away $100.00 in RP once a month. Free RP

embed.description: Free photo gallery is sharing website, you can upload, share your photo in this gallery totally Free.

body:
Hello y'all. I am gonna make this simple. I will be giving away free RP once a month. This month I am giving away 100.00 in RP. Some months, I might give away Rp, and a skin. Please check out my new free photo gallery 

How do I enter you ask? I could make this month hard, and do a cross word puzzle. I could make it easy, and just ask for you to respond below! I think I am gonna make it easy :). I will award the RP to one luck winner at the end of April. If I get more than 200, entries I will give away something additional :).

Additional chance to win: You can get an additional chance to win by submitting original art or photography through the submit photo button on the website. I will contact you to see which, name corresponds to you on here, so I can reply with your points.

At the end of April, I will contact you through League of legends.

Example entry:
Entry: League of legends name
Server: What server are you on
Comment: Please let me win

Thank you all
http://www.freephotogallery.net

replies.body: le epic april foolz inc

Entry: Zumac
Server: North America
Comment: omg there's the chance to get all the skins I've wanted, you're so nice for this, regardless of who wins X)
Thank you for the compliment. Zumac please vote the post up. Thank you
So who won you fraud?

Entry: UdyrWwYi Jg ONLY
Server: NA
Comment: You might want to force people to watermark their images with their summoner name, so people don't just spam a ton of images on a bunch of accounts to win (since you don't ask for their summoner name UNTIL they win).
Most people used there summoner name on their forums name. Only one person has sent me an image so far.

Stephenizgod  

NA  

Lol how fun would it be if you actually gave me $100 in RP, id Mystery Gift the hell out of my friends and myself and maybe cool people i meet after games.
Hey you gotta share the wealth haha
Last time someone gave me RP i mystery gifted all my friends 1 skin and 1 champion (except my friend who owned all champions he got 2 skins)
Nice :)

Edit: Attempted to post this picture on the gallery but i kept getting an error message no matter what i tried, posting it here because i thought it was too good. [My friend Matt got pulled in a premade 5v5](http://imgur.com/HsOquqw)

Entry: Zamrayz
Server: NA
Comment?: 
Haha, still learning the game, and today is definitely a hectic day with the whole login issues and lots of shit-face excited happy people wanted to play urf after the whole "Riot" thing spread around throughout the year. Im hoping everyone who has gotten in is enjoying them selves like i am. 

 As for me, I'm here for the same reason everyone else is. No quarrels with winning or not, i mean 100$ would be like.. If that golden urf icon was real xD For a sec i really thought it cost 99,999 rp. Did you? Lmao.. yea. If i do happen to somehow win, for any or no reason at all, don't be expecting me to hog it for my self. I don't have many friends, but for all the ones that have stuck around and offered me their time to talk and enjoy a simple game together, every will definitely get something in return :) also, i have a donation i wish to give to somebody who deserves it, running tournaments to give away free rp and skins to winners. Me helping never nor being on enough doesn't give me as much time as i would like to join in on the whole rp fest. So why not jump at the chance i see here, right now, if it hasn't already been announced someone has won it? (I assume..)

GL to everyone in this thread, and last but not least.. As an artist my self, but with lack of equipment atm to upload pictures or with the lack of a tablet to help me digitally draw.. YOU HAVE A WONDERFUL ART GALLERY, IF IT'S YOURS! The photos are wonderful!

P.S (If you're interested in free tournaments, add and message me and i'll send you a link. Help fill the community! < 3) 

Happy April 1st! 
Try not to get pranked. 
Haha :)

{{champion:37}} is broken in Urf. Lol.. don't ban her unless you don't want to see her on the enemy team as well.
{{champion:6}} is Urgod. his q is ridic. Just a tip.
Thank you for the compliments on photogallery. If you want, I can water mark your pictures before I post them on the site. If you wish to share you artwork with the world.
